casebody.data:
COMMISSIONER OF CONSUMER PROTECTION
v.
RESERVATION SERVICES INTERNATIONAL, INC. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 3, 2017 Proloy K. Das and Eric B. Miller, in support of the petition. Clare E. Kindall, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39990) is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
